title: Trident of the Waves
content:
as their ships, their cargo, and, while she's at it, them. Trident Thrown Versatile 1.8 630

Trident of the Waves

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6)+1 Piercing+1d4 Cold

The Water Caller: On a hit, create a 2m water surface centred around the target.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Umberlee, the goddess of the sea, is deeply capricious, intelligent, and not nearly as wet around the edges as her domain might suggest. She often demands sacrificial
